title: Everything You Need To Know About The Housing Market w/ Jaspreet Singh EP 1313
description:
Jaspreet Singh, the Minority Mindset, is an attorney, investor, and CEO of Market Briefs. Although he didn't receive any formal financial education, he is on a mission to make financial education fun and accessible.

In this episode you will learn:

  • How the economy and real estate markets are connected.
  • To utilize a growing financial education as a tool.
  • Why you should be living below your means and investing.
  • Three things to ask yourself before you know if you can afford something.

For more, go to lewishowes.com/1313

Click below to hear Jaspreet’s previous episodes,

Take These Steps If You Want to Become Rich - EP 1301

Money Habits To Prepare Against Inflation, Market Crashes & A Recession - EP 1283

The Biggest Lies You've Been Told About Money, Debt & Building Wealth - EP 1257

How To Prepare For Financial Freedom In A Changing Economy - EP 1254
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
